content:
I'm going to write a patch to do the mass rename away from Ebb now that the feature gate has been removed. I've posted the proposed naming scheme on the github issue, https://github.com/bytecodealliance/cranelift/issues/1303. Please look it over and let me know if you have objections.

Complete the transition to Basic Blocks 路 Issue #1303 路 bytecodealliance/cranelift
Basic blocks have been default-enabled for a while. Speaking with @bnjbvr, the project has decided to keep moving forward on replacing Ebbs with Blocks. The remaining points of work to finish that ...
